data.title: searching vendor using ONE search term which is part of search term 1 OR 2

qas.question: Hi gurus, in vendors general data are two fields "search term 1" and "search term 2". Is it possible to generate a search help to find results in "search term 1" OR "search term 2" ? In the search help I would prefer 1 input field "search term" and get results, if the pattern of "search term" matches "search term 1" OR "search term 2". How could this be done? Thanks for your help, Ralph Alexander

answers.text: Hi Ralph, If you look at defination of search term it states: Short description used for search helps. There are two such fields for search terms. Both fields can be used independently of each other. say you can used to input short name of the vendor (testing) for easy search and second field you can input category e.g- utilities etc. to identified that vendor which you have define in search help. basically search term is used in search help goto FBL1n and in vendor# field click F4 (select vendor search using address attribute) in search term 2 put utilities it will give list of all vendor having utilities mentioned in search term 2. but if you input testing & utilities it will search for both these citeria. please refer search help for more details (http://help.sap.com/saphelp_nw04/helpdata/en/97/24a23fa34ffb47e10000000a114084/content.htm) hope this helps Please assign points as way to say thanks Message was edited by: Ravi Rana

data.title: How to locate the user id of user which created a Business Partner Master Data set

qas.question: Hi everyone, First post on here, on a number of occasions I have found either the answer to or a steer towards when facing a issue, hopefully someone can help with this question. I'm working with SAP B1, v9 PL11 on SQL 2008R2. I have to create a query which displays; cardcode, cardname, createdate, cardtype, username of creating user, on or after a date variable. Having looked over the OCRD table I can't see a specific field containing data that would correspond to a user code. OUSR looks like a good candidate with the user details but I don't think I can see any data types which are directly comparable so not able to make a workable join.. I've tried a number of combinations, such as ocrd.usersign = ousr.usersign and while it returned data it was not correct. Please can someone help me find the name of the relevant field, or table which would contain this value so I can then complete my query. Many thanks in advance!

answers.text: Hi, Welcome to SAP B1 forum. Try this query: SELECT T0.[CardCode], T0.[CardName],T0.usersign, T1.[U_NAME] FROM OCRD T0 left join OUSR T1 on t1.userid = t0.usersign WHERE T0.[CardType] = 'c' Thanks & Regards, Nagarajan

data.title: How to get Essential and additional qualifications ,From which table

qas.question: Hi all, In one of my requirement, the report should show the Qualifications and Essential qualifications columns in the output. Requirement is : 1. I have brought qualifications of Applicant from PB0024 table. 2. I need to compare these with the Qualifications maintained in Job for the pernr. 3. There are two types of Qualifications namely essential Qualifications and additional Qualifications. 4. How do we get the Qualifications maintained for a job/Position? How can we distinguish between Qualifications and essential Qualifications maintained for a job at the database table level ? Please reply ASAP. Regards, Rama.P

answers.text: Hi Rama, Goto HRP1001. OTYPE = C-for job(S-for position) OBJID = job/position ID (8-digits) RSIGN = A RELAT = 031 SCLAS = Q If PRIOX = 1 --> SOBID field gives the essential requirements for the job/position. If PRIOX = 0 --> SOBID field gives the additional requirements for the job/position. Regards, Dilek

data.title: How to find the deliveries which does not have Carnot and SHPCON

qas.question: I have a scenario where for some of the deliveries no CARNOT idoc or SHPCON idocs were not been created or went into error, i have verified it in by going to we05 and found there were many idcos in error and some of the idocs were been set to status 68 and they were manually processed by users. is there any table where i can extract the deliveries which does not have SHPCON idocs created.

answers.text: hi, you have to take two steps in this: first step: Table EDIDC which contains EDI Control records. which stores the partner number,partner functions & message types. 2nd step: take that partners and get deliveries from LIKP table. regards, balajia

data.title: How to Convert Drill Down Report into Line Item Report which is already created via Report Painter?

qas.question: Hi Expert, I have a requirement to convert the existing custom drill down report into direct Line Items details report. As currently user don't want to see the Header level details, when report he execute via transaction after passing the parameter i selection screen. As current report flow is it show Header level details in Column Model format and once user select any of the column / field and from menu bar select EXTRA then select Line Item then able to see the Line Item details report. I believe it can be achieve via Report Painter itself but as ABAPER do we need to have some input from FI consultant in order to fullfill this requirement. Thanks in Advance !!!

answers.text: Hivid429 vid429 You should provide a bit more details on exactly the content of the report and the data expected in the line item report since none of us have access to your system. If you have a Finance colleague, why not speak to him/her to check the feasibility and put a more specific question. In general it is possible to use report painter for line item reports. The below wiki links might be useful to you https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/display/ERPFI/Report+Painter https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/display/ERPFI/Report+Painter https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=52001 https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=52001 Thanks & Regards Sanil Bhandari

data.title: which program is started in backend for approval of leave ?

qas.question: I try to figure out which progamm is started in the backend as soon as a portal user presses a line to approve and clicks to approve a long time passes before he or she can continue in the backend in sm50 I see a lot of programms passing by but I can't trace it back to the programm that gets started in the backend. I keep running around in loops when I do the where used button some of the programms I see passing by are SAPLHRTIM00COLLISION SAPLHRTIM00_TMWPREPROCESSOR SAPLHRTIM00_TMWSUPPFUNCPOOL SAPLRPRR SAPLPTWS CL_PT_TMW_BLP_TPHANDLER=======CP anybody got a clue how to find the programm which is started by the portal ? kind regards arthur

answers.text: Hey hi , Programe .....Not really There are RFC ( Remote Fucntion module ) does all Fucntionality ......... AS we know in the RFC there are allready Code written ................. Ok following are list of RFC which trigger when some application run on the PORTAL site PT_ARQ_F4HELP_SICKCODE check this FM..this will clearly give the sickness codes BAPI_TRIP_GET_DETAILS Print Detail Tables For Trip (Receipt Entry) PT_ARQ_TEAMCALE_GET View Team clalender **************************** RH_GET_MANAGER_ASSIGNMENT Determine Organizational Units for Chief ******************************** RH_GET_LEADER Structure of List of People ********************************* Etc ect.......................you need to do it by following ways Say you need to check the whts is RFC for Employee Profile then once u log on the PORTAL atthe same id you need to log in the SAP BACK end with same ID .... then go to ST05 ......select "RFC trace" ........then execute Employee Profile on Portal in the back end in display RFC trace you can find RFC "HRMSS_RFC_EP_READ_PERSONALDATA"

data.title: find the po's which not related to mrp

qas.question: hi all, i need to know that any mrp related indicator is there in the PO ( frond end or in table ) i created one report to take open po list . in that some of the po's are not showing in md04 screen. means its not related or the mrp view were not maintained while po is created. how can i findout this type of po's.......

answers.text: Hi Raj , Please check the following select the Open Pos based on Material and plant in EKPO table . and then check the table MARC for all materials &plants combination from the step 1 and check the field MRP type MARC- DISMM . This field should not be blank or ND. To view MD04 the following conditions are mandatory Material number and Plant PO should have material number ( ekpo table material number field should not be blank) eventhough the material number available in ekpo table it should have the MRP type (marc -dismm field should not be blank or ND) System will check procurement type . MRP should have run for this material . Hope this inputs help you to understand MD04 (stock and requirement list ) Best regards, Chithaanantham

data.title: Which file include "AddOnInstaller"

qas.question: Hi, there I am using VB.net to develop B1 Addon, I use some source code about addon install, but there is an error type of "AddOnInstaller.AddOnInstallInfo" not defined, so can not compile, who knows which file include "AddOnInstaller". Thanks in advance. Lanjun

answers.text: The path to the AddOnInstaller.dll is sent as a command line parameter when your add-on get installed. The parameter is DefaultInstallPath|PathToAddOnInstallAPI I think the default path is in C:\Program files\SAP Manage\SAP Business One Hope it helps, Adele

data.title: Which is the customizing navigation for validation rules?

qas.question: Hi All, which is the customizing navigation for validation rules? (t.code GGB1) Thanks

answers.text: Hi, Customisation for validation normally maintained in GGB0 Follow the below steps 1. Maintain prerequisite 2. Maintain check 3. Maintain message 4. Assign with cc in ob28 and activate prasad

data.title: Which is the table where the stock at the time of MRP run is stored?

qas.question: Hi Gurus, My client has a requirement to create a zreport on MRP analysis. In this report I need to consider the stock of a material at the time of the MRP run date. Can you let me know, whether SAP stores the stock of the material at the time of MRP run. If so, kindly tell me the name of the table in which the stock is stored. Thanks in advance. Harikrishnan.

answers.text: Harikrishnan, It sounds like your requirement is to manipulate the output of the MRP run (including the stock used during the MRP calculation). When MRP creates a list, the output is usually found in tables MDKP (header) and MDTC (item). MDTC data is a cluster table, and the data is stored in compressed form, so you will have to use a function module (I think it is MD_STOCK_REQUIREMENTS_LIST_API) to read the data. Rgds, DB49

data.title: Interface which updates OM and PA data

qas.question: Dear gurus, I have an client interview for a project and the interview will focus on the following, OM (An interface which updates OM data from one system to other system) ,two diff countries system PA (An interface which updates PA data from one System to other System ),again two diff countries system so please help me , where should i concentrate and what might be the possible questions. your help would be greatly appreciated. thanks very much regards jeeva

answers.text: Hi, You may be asked about the tools used for Org Chart. Which tools are used. Questions on Reporting Structure and workflow You may also be asked about Nakisa and Org Plus How consolidation reports are generated. Integration part on Pa and field mapping etc. Regards, Kapil Kaushal

data.title: Acquistiion of assets from a merged company which is not in SAP

qas.question: Dear All, Our company code is effective from FY2007. Recently we acquired a company which has a different ERP system and want to merge their assets into our present company code. How should we deal this in SAP. I can't upload using AS91 since it throws an error message "Closed fiscal year does not agree with legacy data transfer date". Regards, Srinivas.

answers.text: Hi, An other option that I use in these cases is to create the assets withAS01(with the option Post capitalization)and upload the values withabsoand transaction type147(then you can upload by depreciation area the aq value, depreciation and depreciation this fiscal year). AS01 abso 147 Only for assset capitalized this year I used the last day of the last fiscal year, otherwise I have problems with the calculation from the depreciation For the upload with LSMW I fill in the old asset / sub number and with the upload from the values I search in ANLC base on the old asset number to found the created asset number.

data.title: Query to find which users running add-on

qas.question: Hi, Is there any query that will show me information about which users are running with add-on? I need to know which users have startet a certain add-on. Thanks, Kjetil Sandvik

answers.text: Hi, Not possible to get query. Once user logged in, based on setting, the Add-on will be connected. If you control the add-on, set to manual start under Add-on manager. Thanks & Regards, Nagarajan

data.title: MRBR qty and prc blocked at which point

qas.question: Dear Forum, Any way to know the quantity block and also price block is at which point? in MRBR not telling. The quantity block can be between po vs gr or gr vs ir or po vs ir. so how to know at which point it is blocked? The price block can be between po vs gr or gr vs ir or po vs ir. so how to know at which point it is blocked? thanks

answers.text: Before saving invoice document it will chcek the tolerance limits (OMR6) defined for that company code ,if it is within the tolerance then it will not block the invoice otherwise it will block . Which point ?- obviously in MIRO . Because that time it create invoice document . Without invoice document how can it block invoice?

answers.text: ME80FN ME2L

data.title: deactivation of dep area which already postings made

qas.question: Hello We have created one AUC and uploaded some vales in dep area 7,8, and 9 worngly. We want to deactivate those dep areas? How can we do it, if not how can I make them zero.is it possint to activate dep areas for other existing asset if yes how can? Regards Sunitha

answers.text: Hi Sunitha, if the deprecation area has values you can't deactivate them and also you can't delete them. Perhaps the transactions ANSICHT is a possibility. Here you can make the area not visible. Perhaps there is another very simple solution: Just let the needless area in the asset. Regards Bernhard

data.title: which structure is used for select option

qas.question: which structure is used for select option?

answers.text: Hello SELECT-OPTIONS sel FOR f. it is equivalent DATA: BEGIN OF sel OCCURS 10, SIGN(1), OPTION(2), LOW LIKE f, HIGH LIKE f, END OF sel.

data.title: Which will be faster downtime or resource minimized

qas.question: Hi all, We are planning to perform our upgrade from ECC 5.0 to ECC 6 (EHP4). We are doing all the tasks including initialization, extractions...till finalisation during the downtime weekend itself, since we are migrating to a different server, we have decided to do this. So in that case, which scenario will be faster downtime minized approach or resource minimized approach I trust resource minimized will be faster. Thanks Senthil

answers.text: Hi Senthil, Downtime minimized will be the faster way to complete the upgrade. I suggest you not to change anything till completion of upgrade activity or better to start later it can ruin your project plan. Better way is to Migrate your hardware/server , start preparation , initialization,extraction everything on new server only . After migration, how you will verify that all pre-requisites are still matched. So better to move safe! Regards, Gagan Deep Kaushal

data.title: Launching the depreciation, which cost center is posted?

qas.question: Hi All, an asset contain a cost center in its master data. For the Cost elemen which refers to that asset, in t.code OKB9 in signed as defualt another cost center. When I launch the depreciation of that asset, which cost center is posted? The one in it's master data or the other that i find in t.code OKB9? Thanks G.Rossi

answers.text: Hi, if you make customizing in acset and additional account assignment for asset, then from asset master data
